pr_title: DHFPROD-5330: Fix alignment and words used in the zero state page

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to combine these tests into a single test.
timeline.author: brucean52

replies.bodyText: I can combine them but I think shorter tests are more stable and much easier to debug.
replies.author: timur-isangulov

replies.bodyText: But isn't the whole point of e2e tests is to test real world user scenarios? Chaining user commands together is the best way to do that.
replies.author: brucean52
